channel.title: Can't connect to my own server?
channel.description:
I've been on here for a while, and recently got a new computer, so everything was lost. I'm at the point where it says the server compiled fine, the server is online, and the client is running fine. But when I try to get on my server, it says random things like "An unexpected error has occured". I tried a couple different usernames, passwords, ip's (localhost, 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1) and even a couple of different clients and sources. I checked my firewall and it's off. What else can be the problem?
Forgot to mention: I checked the port, it was the correct port for each source (43594)

item.title: Can't connect to my own server?
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Is that not exactly what i said?

Read full topic

item.description:
@YoungMula wrote:

your ip could have been changed and you might have to portforward again.

item.title: Can't connect to my own server?
item.dc:creator: @Fireweaver0 Fireweaver0
item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

If you got a new computer make sure you are forwarding the correct local ip it could have changed.

Read full topic
